name: Kids Songs Collection - Baby Sign and Sing Rhymes & Phonics Games For Toddlers
name_original: Kids Songs Collection - Baby Sign and Sing Rhymes & Phonics Games For Toddlers
description:
Your favorite Kids songs collection Audio App has now gone a step further.
We believe that rhymes are a child’s best friend. So we have introduced another good friend in the form of famous stories. As your little one grows, he chooses between beautiful rhymes.

Your app now has:


●100% Free Content
●Rhymes are already non-stream. Just hit play.

Email: indigoapps01@gmail.com
